title: [FEATURE] Gray16 support
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

i want to use 16bit grayscale pngs but it looks like it doesnt exist in skiasharp: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/skiasharp.skcolortype

### Describe the solution you would like

add SkColorType.Gray16 

### Describe alternatives you have considered

n/a

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct

comments.author: molesmoke
comments.body:
There's no Gray16 support upstream:
https://api.skia.org/SkColorType_8h.html
